Paragraph.Text:
This is main storage block for Quantum Storage System (QSS). Can hold up to 4k items.
WARNING! Picking up block will destroy stored items! This is partialy by desing - you can't just pickup bits of data. Currently I don't see possibility to permanently save data to item, at least not this specific item data.
This block can be connected to other Quantum Storage (to any side) or to back of Quantum Storage Controller.
